title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys discuss Aaron Rodgers spiritual retreat. Would they try hallucinogens? They revisit their NFL hot takes from 2021 and make new ones for the 2022 season. And Bill Plaschke shares the latest on the Lakers contract discussion with LeBron James. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
